title: One Bert Show Member's Partner Has Had A Change Of Heart About Their Future
description:
Our Producer Romeo has been in a long-distance relationship for the last few years. Recently he had a conversation with his girlfriend about her moving to his state. She was on board, but over the last few weeks, her plans have changed. Now he's worried about their future.
